bin/pgp_slave 127.0.0.255 &
bin/pgp_master 127.0.0.255 600


00 = Open
01 = Closed
02 = Hardware Switch
So:
[B8 00 08 0A 40 00 00 00]
[B8 00 08 0A 40 00 00 01]
[B8 00 08 0A 40 00 00 02]

# Pull Board
[d0 00 f9]

DPM 0
[D0 00 FB 01]

DPM 1
[D0 00 FB 02]


DPM 2
[D0 00 FB 04]

DPM 3
[D0 00 FB 08]

DTM
[D0 00 FB 10]

DTM/CEN
[D0 00 FB 30]
[D0 00 FB 30]

ALL
[D0 00 FB 7F]

ALL But CEN/RTM
[D0 00 FB 1F]


Standalone:

[B8 00 0D 0A 40 00 02]

Shelf Manager:

[B8 00 0D 0A 40 00 01]

Network:

[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 C4 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 C8 00 04 06 00 00 00]

DPM1:
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 CC 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D0 00 04 06 00 00 00]

DPM2:
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D4 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D8 00 04 06 00 00 00]

DPM3:
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 DC 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 E0 00 04 06 00 00 00]



[B8 00 08 0A 40 00 00 01]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 C4 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 C8 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 CC 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D0 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D4 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 D8 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 DC 00 04 06 00 00 00]
[D0 00 03 10 01 00 00 E0 00 04 06 00 00 00]
